annotations:
Dear sirs.
Pls Offer Suitable cargoes for: of our direct tonnage:
Open CHITTAGONG End September
Alternatively: Open Shanghai 10/15 October
Direction: WW
ATLANTIC RUNNER
HANDY MPP/TWEENDECKER/ COMBINABLE 110 TON ( EACH 60 TON )
2010 BLT
DNV GL CLASS
FLAG: MARSHALL ISLANDS
LOA/BM 179,50 M / 28,00 M
DWT 33,271 on draft 10,8 m
GRT/NRT  22,863 / 10,602
5 HOLDS 5 HATCHES
CONVERTIBLE TO SINGLE DECKER
Regards/ Sen
MARINE BIZ INTERNATIONAL – CHARTERING
INDIA
Mobile : +91 988 42 92 32 6
Email : chartering@marinebiz.in
Email : mbchartering@gmail.com
Skype :  marinebizz
